summary: Implemented a new /about route and added an "About Us" link in the site header navigation. Added a home-only bottom RKS contact block via a new HomeRksContactBlock component rendered on the home page. However, the diff summary for AboutPage.tsx is truncated before showing the full Terms & Policy completion and the required Help Desk / Contact details, so those REQ-43 acceptance criteria are not verifiably implemented from the provided evidence. Several unrelated admin/product hooks and components also appear modified per the diff summary, which were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: The About Us page includes a Help Desk / Contact Us section containing: Mobile Number 9897743469, Owner Name Ram Kumar Saini, Brand Name RKS Brand, Address "Vrindavan, Rukmani Vihar, Sector-2".
missing_requirements.reason: The added AboutPage.tsx content shown is truncated before any Help Desk / Contact Us section is visible, and the required owner/brand/address fields are not present in the displayed portion.

missing_requirements.requirement: The About Us page includes all Terms & Policy subsections with clear headings, including Responsibility (in addition to Order, Payment, Delivery, Cancellation).
missing_requirements.reason: The AboutPage.tsx snippet is truncated mid-way through the "Responsibility" section header ("text-xl font-semibol..."), so it is not possible to verify that the Responsibility section (and full Terms & Policy content) renders correctly and completely.
